title: 服务器重启以后就一直重启不了
author: 黑貓郡主
txt_content:
12.09 23:48:35 [Multicraft] Server stopped
12.09 23:48:35 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 1
12.09 23:48:35 [Multicraft] Server shut down
12.09 23:48:35 [Server] INFO Error: Unable to access jarfile /jar/cauldron1.7.10.1388.jar
12.09 23:48:35 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "Default"
12.09 23:48:35 [Multicraft] Starting server!
12.09 23:48:35 [Multicraft] Loading server properties
12.09 23:48:35 [Multicraft] Server stopped
12.09 23:48:35 [Multicraft] Retrying server startup


重启一下服务器就这样了，求解决

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 不能取读服务器核心（请检查核心位子）如果没有权限更换核心请联系商家

replies.author: KingCola
replies.txt_content: Error: Unable to access jarfile /jar/cauldron1.7.10.1388.jar  服务端问题？
